entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: NW 35 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
